vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.56; also called Jaala at Neh.7.58;
§ Jaala or Jaalah = "ascending"
the head of a family of the descendants of Solomon's slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes de Salomón; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅拉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上升"
跟著所羅巴伯歸回的所羅門王僕役的後裔的一個家族領袖
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅拉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上升"
跟着所罗巴伯归回的所罗门王仆役的后裔的一个家族领袖
